title: Process, agents of socialization tied to stability

content.question: Identify an agent of political socialization. Describe the process of political socialization. Explain how political socialization affects a regime’s stability.

frqParts.text: Identify an agent of political socialization. Describe the process of political socialization. Explain how political socialization affects a regime’s stability.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
